title: Unauthorized Log In
body: Why do I keep getting notified that someone is logging in as me? Kind of annoying...Do you guys have security set up? Not mad at you, just at the situation.

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa it definitely sounds like someone was able to figure out your login name and password if someone keeps logging in and kicking you offline. I'd strongly suggest reaching out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make sure your account hasn't damaged yet. No worries if so, we'll be able to reverse that damage after you verify yourself as the account creator.

It was mentioned awhile ago that RIot was considering options for additional security, like verification emails when logins from a new computer are attmpted for example.
Has there been any development or further research done on this?
